content: In case of Cancel Anytime charge USD 50.00 with Death Waiver included for Egypt Air
In case of Refundable ticket , to cancel Anytime charge Penalty and refund BHD 16.00 for KLM Airlines
In case of cancel Before Departure charge BHD 20.00 with Death Waiver Included for Emirates
In case of cancel Before Departure charge USD 35.00 for Kuwait Airlines
In case of cancel After Departure charge 75 percent of fare (BHD 60.00) or one way ticket fare for Kuwait Airlines
In case of cancel Before Departure Charge USD 80.00 with Medical waiver and Child Discount excluded for Turkish Airlines
In case of cancel Before Departure Charge USD 80.00 with Medical waiver and Child Discount excluded for Turkish Airlines
In case of cancel Anytime charge BHD 15.00 with Child discount Included for Cathay Pacific
In case of cancel Anytime no refund will be given with Death Waiver Included and Infant Discount Excluded for Oman Air
In case of No-show Before Departure charge USD 75 with Death Waiver Included for Egypt Air
In case of No-show Before Departure No Refund will be given for Kuwait Airlines
In case of No-show Before Departure charge BHD 40 for Emirates
In case of No-show Anytume charge BHD 30 with child discount and service tax included for Cathay Pacific
In case of No-show Anytime charge BHD 40 for Emirates
